entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump I am a supporter of Trump, but I vehemently disagree with this philosophy as a healthcare worker. We are NEVER going to get ahead of this if we continue to send people back into group settings. #coronavirus #CoronaVirusUpdate #COVID19
